title: Seattle Sounders FC font
content:
Hi friends

Please help me id the font used for Seattle Sounders FC crest

Thanks in advance

Hernando

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214063105im_/http:/typophile.com/files/main_logo_4806.png)
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content:
Pretty sure this is custom design. Few pro teams use anything off-the-shelf any more.

- Mike Yanega

Hi Mike

Ok, but maybe it is based in...

can you suggest a closer typeface to the Seattle Sounders FC ?

Thanks in advance

"Sounders FC" is in modified Verlag. So says the team's PR department:

[http://www.soundersfc.com/News/Articles/2008/04-April/Badge-and-Colors-F...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214063105/http:/www.soundersfc.com/News/Articles/2008/04-April/Badge-and-Colors-Fact-Sheet.aspx "http://www.soundersfc.com/News/Articles/2008/04-April/Badge-and-Colors-Fact-Sheet.aspx")
